name: Psyche (Sauce_Man50)
description:
In this 2D, top-down, horror game you play as a pathological liar whose fibs finally caught up to him. You have to go inside your mind, find the truths, and avoid the lies. Your mind is a dark place, but you can use your psyche to brighten it up a bit and defeat lies, but we careful: Using too much psyche will drive you insane.

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys to move and click to use your light (The light will follow the cursor). Collect as many Truths (white sparkly orb things) as you can.

I took the theme of the Jam pretty literally. The game is a liar, who actually hides the truth, which you need to go find. It's a bit of a stretch, but whatever. This is also my first published game.

I'm also working on another project with friends call Voidbound. Find out out by looking up Double Edge Studios on social media.
